thread.title: World Debut of Aruze Gaming's Newest Slot Machine
thread.title_full: World Debut of Aruze Gaming's Newest Slot Machine

author: Cynthia Gonzalez
title: World Debut of Aruze Gaming's Newest Slot Machine
text:
World Debut of Cube-X Ultimate Platform Aruze Gaming America, Inc. and Carnival Corp & plc are excited to announce the world’s first placement of Aruze’s new Cube-X Ultimate Platform on their ships. The Cube-X Ultimate™ platform includes the “999.9 Gold Wheel Series;” which includes “Bags of Cash™,” and “The Gold Legend™” games. Featured on these games is a large mechanical wheel which determines the credit prize awarded during the free games feature. There are up to four progressive levels available on the Gold Wheel series.
Kelcey Allison, CEO of Aruze Gaming America, Inc. says “We are thrilled to continue our partnership with Carnival Corp & plc ., one of the largest vacation companies in the world, to debut these exciting new games with “wheel on reel” technology to their customers”. Marty Goldman, SVP Global Casino Operations for Carnival Corporation says, “Given Aruze’s strong track record for both performance and service with us, we are excited to be the first in market with this next generation game from such an innovative partner. We look forward to continued strong results”.
Aruze Gaming is a global entertainment company that designs, develops, and manufactures slot machines and gaming devices for the global casino market.
Carnival Corporation & plc is a global cruise company and one of the largest vacation companies in the world. Our portfolio of leading cruise brands includes Carnival Cruise Line, Holland America Line, Princess Cruises, Seabourn, and Fathom in North America; P&O Cruises and Cunard in the United Kingdom; AIDA Cruises in Germany; Costa Cruises in Southern Europe; and P&O Cruises in Australia.
